title: On the plot area excluding area to be handed over to MCGM/Appropriate Authority in lieu of Reservation/ Existing amenity in the DP/ proposed DP roads/prescribed RL under MMC Act
clause_text: On the plot area excluding area to be handed over to MCGM/Appropriate Authority in lieu of Reservation/ Existing amenity in the DP/ proposed DP roads/prescribed RL under MMC Act . Such Schemes shall not be permissible on lands reserved/existing amenity in the DP& in SDZ/GZ.
section: 33(11)Provisions relating to Permanent Transit Camp tenements for Slum Rehabilitation Scheme:

source_pdf.text_snippet: On the plot area excluding area to be handed over to MCGM/Appropriate Authority in lieu of Reservation/ Existing amenity in the DP/ proposed DP roads/prescribed RL under MMC Act .
